overview_description.description: Zeroe is an enterprise SaaS platform powered by AI, designed to measure emissions and provide reports on decarbonization performance. The company's objective is to accelerate the global decarbonization initiative. In an era where the imperative of climate action is more evident than ever, we firmly believe that businesses play a pivotal role in effecting significant change. Zeroe strives to simplify the challenge of overseeing corporate carbon footprints, making it an accessible and achievable process.

properties.growth_insight_description: Zeroe may be growing as it has recently secured USD 2.2 million in funding, which is a strong indicator of investor confidence and financial backing to support its operations and potential expansion. This influx of capital could enable the company to enhance its AI-powered SaaS platform, further develop its emissions measurement and decarbonization reporting capabilities, and possibly increase its market reach within the CleanTech and Sustainability sectors. Additionally, securing such funding suggests that Zeroe has a viable business model and growth strategy that has attracted financial support.

about_short_description.short_description: Zeroe is an enterprise SaaS platform powered by AI, designed to measure emissions and provide reports on decarbonization performance.

product.name: Carbon Management and Reporting Platform
product.description: A platform for mapping, capturing, measuring, analyzing, setting targets for, and reporting on carbon emissions in compliance with GHG protocol and other standards.

product.name: Audit-Ready Emissions Reporting & Compliance
product.description: Generates reports aligned with TCFD, CDP, SASB, and GRI standards, ensuring compliance with local and national regulations.

product.name: Science Based Targets Initiative (SBTi) Alignment
product.description: Helps set and achieve net-zero goals aligned with SBTi, including developing plans to reduce emissions.

product.name: AI-Driven Emission Reduction Identification
product.description: Uses AI to identify actionable areas for emission reduction within an organization.

product.name: Carbon Offsets and Removal Investments
product.description: Provides access to carbon offsets and investments in removal projects to support decarbonization efforts.

product.name: Sustainable Finance Access
product.description: Facilitates access to sustainable finance options based on commitments and performance in emissions reduction.
